Package com.opengamma.strata.pricer.impl.option

Class NormalPriceFunction

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.opengamma.strata.pricer.impl.option.NormalPriceFunction
  • public final class NormalPriceFunction
extends java.lang.Object
    Computes the price of an option in the normally distributed assets hypothesis (Bachelier model).

      • getPriceAdjoint

        public ValueDerivatives getPriceAdjoint​(EuropeanVanillaOption option,
                                        NormalFunctionData data)
        Computes the price of an option in the normally distributed assets hypothesis (Bachelier model). The first order price derivatives are also provided.
        Parameters:
        option - the option description
        data - the model data
        Returns:
        a ValueDerivatives with the price in the value and the derivatives with respect to [0] the forward, [1] the volatility and [2] the strike
